parameters.name: IpamPoolIds
parameters.description: A list of IPAM pool IDs. You can specify up to 100 IDs.

parameters.name: IpamPoolName
parameters.description:
The name of the IPAM pool.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: IpamScopeId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPAM scope.

parameters.name: Ipv6Isp
parameters.description:
The line type of the IPv6 CIDR block. This parameter is valid only for public IPv6 address pools. Valid values:

- **BGP** (default): Alibaba Cloud BGP IPv6.

- **ChinaMobile**

- **ChinaUnicom**

- **ChinaTelecom**

> If your account is whitelisted for single-line bandwidth, you can set this parameter to **ChinaTelecom**, **ChinaUnicom**, or **ChinaMobile**.

parameters.name: IsShared
parameters.description: Specifies whether the address pool is a shared pool.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results. Valid values:

- You do not need to specify this parameter for the first call.

- Set this parameter to the value of NextToken that was returned in the previous call.

parameters.name: PoolRegionId
parameters.description: The region where the IPAM pool is available.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the managed region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query region IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the IPAM pool belongs.

parameters.name: SourceIpamPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the source IPAM pool.
